function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Public and private gatherings with reduced capacity and physical distancing measures.","Impact":"Risk of continued transmission of contagious diseases due to close contact in public spaces.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict capacity limits, implementation of physical distancing measures, and promotion of outdoor gatherings where possible.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, occupancy monitoring systems, and air purification systems.","People":"Public attending gatherings, government officials responsible for policy enforcement, and venue owners.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and venue managers."},{"Description":"Domestic travel ban to prevent the spread of the virus between regions.","Impact":"Reduced risk of virus transmission between areas with varying infection rates.","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of travel bans, provision of essential permits for necessary travel, and promotion of alternative transportation methods.","Technologies":"Digital travel permits, GPS tracking for essential travel, and remote work solutions.","People":"Travelers, transport operators, and local enforcement authorities.","Owner":"Government, transportation companies, and technology providers."},{"Description":"Imposition of curfews to limit movement and reduce person-to-person contact during peak transmission times.","Impact":"Reduced risk of contagion through restricted movement and curtailed social activities.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of curfew regulations, provision of essential services during curfew hours, and promotion of telecommuting and online services.","Technologies":"Geofencing for movement tracking, telecommuting platforms, and online delivery services.","People":"Residents, businesses, and law enforcement agencies.","Owner":"Government, local authorities, and technology companies."}]}
